wikipedia_page.main: John Kenyon Mason (19 December 1919 – 26 January 2017), CBE, FRCPath, DMJ, FRCPE, FRSE, and known as Ken Mason, was an emeritus professor of Forensic Medicine at the University of Edinburgh School of Law.

response: *1983: Law and Medical Ethics (with J. Kenyon Mason) (this text has gone through several editions: an eighth, by Mason and Graeme Laurie, was published in 2010; McCall Smith contributed to the first six editions)
*1987: Butterworths Medico-Legal Encyclopaedia (with J. Kenyon Mason)
*J. Kenyon Mason, 97, British medical and legal scholar.Obituary: Professor Ken Mason, medical jurisprudence pioneer
